name: Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum
description: A lightweight serum that deeply hydrates and plumps the skin using multi-molecular hyaluronic acid for all-day moisture.

name: Brightening Vitamin C Serum
description: Infused with pure vitamin C and botanical extracts, this serum helps fade dark spots and enhances skin radiance.

name: Anti-Aging Retinol Serum
description: A potent serum with encapsulated retinol to reduce fine lines, improve texture, and promote collagen production.

name: Soothing Niacinamide Serum
description: Calms redness and regulates oil production with 10% niacinamide, perfect for sensitive and acne-prone skin.

name: Firming Peptide Serum
description: Boosts elasticity and firmness with a blend of peptides and hyaluronic acid for youthful, resilient skin.

name: Calming Centella Serum
description: Soothes irritated skin with Centella Asiatica extract, strengthening the barrier and reducing inflammation.

name: Glow-Boosting Vitamin E Serum
description: Nourishes and protects with vitamin E, leaving skin glowing, soft, and protected from environmental damage.

name: Pore-Minimizing Salicylic Acid Serum
description: Exfoliates and unclogs pores with salicylic acid, reducing breakouts and refining skin texture.

name: Hydrating Aloe Vera Serum
description: Cooling and hydrating serum with pure aloe vera gel to soothe sunburns and restore moisture balance.

name: Brightening Kojic Acid Serum
description: Fades hyperpigmentation and evens skin tone with kojic acid, derived from natural sources for gentle brightening.

name: Soothing Centella Face Mask
description: A calming sheet mask enriched with Centella Asiatica to soothe irritation and strengthen the skin barrier.

name: Hydrating Hyaluronic Mask
description: Intensely hydrates with hyaluronic acid, providing a plump and dewy complexion in just 20 minutes.

name: Brightening Vitamin C Mask
description: Brightens and revitalizes with vitamin C, leaving skin luminous and refreshed after each use.

name: Detoxifying Charcoal Mask
description: Draws out impurities and excess oil with activated charcoal, purifying pores for clearer skin.

name: Nourishing Collagen Mask
description: Restores elasticity with marine collagen, firming and smoothing the skin for a youthful appearance.

name: Calming Aloe Vera Mask
description: Soothes and cools irritated skin with aloe vera, ideal for post-sun care or sensitive skin types.

name: Pore-Tightening Clay Mask
description: Tightens pores and controls oil with kaolin clay, refining texture for a matte, smooth finish.

name: Revitalizing Ginseng Mask
description: Energizes and rejuvenates with ginseng extract, boosting circulation for vibrant, healthy skin.

name: Foaming Green Tea Cleanser
description: Gentle foaming cleanser with green tea extract to remove impurities while balancing oil and hydration.

name: Gentle Milk Cleanser
description: Creamy, non-foaming cleanser with milk proteins to gently cleanse and nourish dry or sensitive skin.

name: Exfoliating AHA Cleanser
description: Smooths and brightens with glycolic acid, gently exfoliating dead skin cells for renewed radiance.

name: Balancing Oil Cleanser
description: Effectively removes makeup and impurities with a blend of oils, leaving skin balanced and hydrated.

name: Soothing Chamomile Cleanser
description: Calms and cleanses with chamomile extract, perfect for sensitive skin prone to redness and irritation.

name: Purifying Tea Tree Cleanser
description: Fights acne-causing bacteria with tea tree oil, cleansing deeply while maintaining skin's natural balance.

name: Lightweight Daily Sunscreen SPF50+
description: Non-greasy, fast-absorbing sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF50+ for everyday protection against UV rays.

name: Matte Finish Sunscreen SPF40
description: Oil-free formula with SPF40 that provides matte coverage, ideal for oily skin and humid climates.

name: Hydrating Sunscreen SPF30
description: Moisturizing sunscreen with SPF30 and hyaluronic acid, protecting while deeply hydrating the skin.

name: Tinted Sunscreen SPF50
description: Sheer tint provides natural coverage with SPF50, offering protection and a subtle glow without white cast.

name: Waterproof Sunscreen SPF50
description: Sweat and water-resistant SPF50 formula for active lifestyles, ensuring long-lasting UV protection.

name: Mineral Sunscreen SPF35
description: Gentle mineral-based SPF35 with zinc oxide, suitable for sensitive skin and reef-safe for eco-conscious users.
